backend/main.mo: Defines a simple booking actor storing bookings in a List and exposes a createBooking function that generates and saves a booking with timestamp.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing an update to fleet data to use the Toyota Coaster Saloon 4C entry and image.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists prewritten summaries for all frontend files, describing their roles in layout, data, components, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layers and OKLCH variable definitions for light/dark themes with global background and text styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO metadata, font imports, and root mount for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component wiring top navigation, sections, footer, and booking scroll behavior with selectedCar state.
frontend/src/components/FleetCarCard.tsx: Card component displaying vehicle details and an action button invoking onBookNow.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with company info, links, contact details, and caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Contact and booking form section with validation, car pre-selection, and submission via createBooking hook.
frontend/src/components/sections/FleetSe: Displays fleet categories and vehicles using FleetCarCard with filtering by type and booking callback support.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Renders the landing hero with background image, headings, description, and buttons that scroll to the booking section.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhyChoo: Shows a grid of benefit cards highlighting features of the rental service.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Sticky responsive navigation bar with scroll detection, smooth-scroll links, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/data/fleet.ts: Defines the Vehicle interface and exports categorized fleet data including luxury, executive, economy, and group vehicles.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateBooking.ts: Provides a mutation to create a booking via the actor using adapted parameters and refreshes booking queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, authentication handling, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exposes a placeholder bookings query that awaits backend support.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for a luxury light/dark theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentity providers before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins for styling.
project_state.json: Stores the projectâ€™s build state, requirements, design notes, and features for the marketing website.
